name: PM YASASVI Entrance Test (YET)
description: A scholarship scheme for Other Backward Class (OBC), Economically Backward Class (EBC), and De-Notified Tribes (DNT) students.
eligibility: Must belong to OBC/EBC/DNT category
Studying in Class 9 or 11 in identified schools
Parents' annual income not more than ₹2.5 Lakhs

name: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
description: Skill training and financial support for traditional artisans and craftspeople (Vishwakarmas) to upgrade their skills.
eligibility: Must be an artisan or craftsperson
Minimum age 18 years
Not availed similar loan schemes in past 5 years

name: National Overseas Scholarship
description: Financial assistance for low-income students belonging to SC/ST categories to pursue Master's or Ph.D. degrees abroad.
eligibility: Belong to Scheduled Caste (SC) or Landless Agricultural Labour
Secured admission in a foreign university
Below 35 years of age

name: Saksham Scholarship Scheme
description: A scheme aimed at providing encouragement and financial support to specially-abled children to pursue technical education.
eligibility: Disability of not less than 40%
Admitted to 1st year of Degree/Diploma level course
Family income less than ₹8 Lakhs
